dict.acceptation: 文化；[生物学]（微生物等的）培养；修养；养殖；

sent.orig: Bamboo culture, tea culture, flower culture, garden culture, forest aesthetics are the important content.
sent.trans: 竹文化、花文化、茶文化、园林文化、森林美学是森林文化的主要内容和表现形式。

sent.orig: It contains material culture level, behavior culture level, system culture level and spirit culture level.
sent.trans: 它包括物质文化层、行为文化层、制度文化层、精神文化层。

sent.orig: The forms of culture are divided into mass culture, elegant culture and dominant culture.
sent.trans: 当代中国社会转型期，随着社会的分化，审美文化分化为大众文化、高雅文化和主导文化。

sent.orig: Finally, constructing dormitory area culture which contacting to the traditional culture, time culture and campus culture.
sent.trans: 五是充分发掘文化对大学生教育作用，建设与传统文化、时代文化和校园文化紧密结合的园区文化。

sent.orig: While, Chinese culture a collectivist culture, western culture is mainly anindividualistic culture.
sent.trans: 中国的文化以群体主义为中心，然而西方国家则是独立主义文化国家。
